Created attachment 29385
add support for DELETE and PUT

Related to Bug 53661 is the inability to write Rivet pages that respond to methods other than GET or POST.

With RESTful services becoming more common these days, users will want to respond to the variety of other methods available such as DELETE and PUT. 

Attached is a patch to add DELETE and PUT, which we are already using in production.

However, it is possible that other users might want to support other methods such as COPY, MOVE, LOCK, MERGE, or others?  Someone might want to implement their own WebDAV compliant server in Rivet to emulate access to some kind of datastore, for example.
